summary: This mod adds some fresh blood into the weaponry
descriptionHtml:
LATEST VERSION 1.01

This mod adds some fresh blood into the weaponry :) Crush your enemies with a giant club or executioner axe or kill them silently with fork, knife or a shil :) All weapons are craftable and upgradable, the clubs can also be gathered from dead giants. Axe is iron, the other 4 are steel. 
Enjoy! Feedback is welcome!

Instalation: Install with NMM or copy the esp file into the Data folder of your Skyrim directory.

UPDATES:
1.00 - original version
[color=FF0000]1.01 - added Shovel, small fixes and weapon sounds corrections[/color]

My other mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12507]Ancient Nord Light Armor[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12504]Food and Drinks Reworked[/url]
author: kiko148
